entry.title: Saturday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 6.

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming west 20 km/h in the afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 01:43 AM EST Sunday 05 March 2023
